author: jrgott

comments.content: You’re welcome. Both it and [Braggadocio](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203142924/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/braggadocio-mt/) have been making appearances here this week.
It truly is a brave new world.

It’s $30.00.  
Futura Black from Linotype: $24.00  
Futura Black from Scangraphic Digital Type: $17.50

Yes, I saw that. ;)  
But screw different versions and copies of dubious origin!
